```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
library(readr)
heart <- read_csv("data/jp_heart_attack_dataset.csv")
ship <- read_csv("data/Ship_Pfm_Dataset.csv")

heart 

ship
```

```{r}
local_missing <- which(is.na(heart))
count_missing <- sum(is.na(heart))

local_missing
print (count_missing)

summary(heart)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = heart,
  aes(x = Gender, color = Region)) +
    geom_bar()

ggplot(data = heart,
  aes(x = Gender, y = Age)) +
    geom_boxplot()

ggplot(data = heart,
  aes(x = Region, y = Age)) +
    geom_boxplot()

ggplot(data = heart,
  aes(x = Diabetes_History, y = Age)) +
    geom_boxplot()

```

```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data = heart,
       aes(x = Heart_Attack_Occurrence, y = Cholesterol_Level)) +
  geom_boxplot()

ggplot(data = heart,
       aes(x = Heart_Attack_Occurrence, y = Stress_Levels)) +
  geom_boxplot()

ggplot(data = heart,
       aes(x = Heart_Attack_Occurrence, y = Heart_Rate)) +
  geom_boxplot()

ggplot(data = heart,
       aes(x = Gender, y = Heart_Rate)) +
  geom_boxplot()

ggplot(data = heart,
       aes(x = Family_History, y = Heart_Rate)) +
  geom_boxplot()

ggplot(data = heart,
       aes(x = Gender, y = BMI)) +
  geom_boxplot()


```
